rules:
    paths-kebab-case:
        description: Should paths be kebab-case.
        message: {{property}} should be kebab-case (lower case and separated with hyphens)
        severity: warn
        given: $.paths[*]~
        then:
            function: pattern
            functionOptions:
            match: ^(/|[a-z0-9-.]+|{[a-zA-Z0-9_]+})+$
